entry.data:
CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
